item.description:
Valentine Transformational Breathwork Group. Bring guests and partners for free.

Weekly group in Boston area. Please RSVP to secure spot.

To read more about Transformational Breathwork please check this meetup intro & board.

If you chose to enroll into breathwork sessions, attending free meetup meetings is recommended as they will provide excellent venue for support and sharing experiences.

One-to-one sessions also available, please inquire.

Please feel free to email with any questions.

Elena

Group session fees (contact me if you need financial arrangements: money should never be a
preclusion for transformational breathing)
$40 - $30 sliding scale 1-10 sessions.
No expiration, no weekly attendance requirements.

10 consecutive sessions recommended for
best cumulative effect, and as the most efficient
approach to accelerate your personal growth
and learning, enabling you to do breathwork
on your own. This unique, simple and accessible
healing and spiritual growth modality will become
your lifestyle.
item.name: Valentine Transformational Breathwork Group
